website_summaries.verdict: Most of those who have tested the Wave Horizon 2 believed that it was a worthy update to the recent series from Mizuno. They welcomed its apparently efficient stability features, its correct sizing scheme and width profiles, and the comfortable underfoot experience. Some testers lamented its seemingly large silhouette, but they’re isolated complaints.
pros: The stability mechanics of the Mizuno Wave Horizon 2 were lauded by some consumers
This running shoe was true-to-size, according to several testers
A reviewer commented that the fit was perfect
A few runners who had tendon and muscle problems reported that the underfoot platform was able to alleviate their discomfort
The premium sock liner received positive feedback from a purchaser who thought that it offered some extra bounce in every step
cons: A few people noted that the façade of this running shoe looked awkwardly bulky

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and support with a good weight balance
customer_reviews.text: I have a hard time finding shoes that fit my wide, flat foot, but these do the trick. I normally wear Altras but am finding that durability is a BIG issue with that brand. Also, I'm a heavier runner who also does triathlons, and I must say I really enjoy the comfort of these shoes. They're a little crazy in the looks department, and I wish the material wouldn't get dirty quite so easily. But, they are fairly light for their size and really comfortable. I highly recommend these shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Teachey

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit. But shoes smell and inside fell apart VERY quickly!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes were fantastic in the fit. Probably the most comfortable shoe I've ever owned. That is across New Balance, Nike, Merrell, Vasque, etc. They were bought as walking shoes, so nothing heavy duty. They started to smell awful, a problem I've never had before with my feet and shoes. They also fell apart at the inside heal area in both shoes. Again, I've never had these issues. I really want to buy another pair, but know they'll fall apart again. Now, they are unusable because of the heal issues. A set of Odor Eaters insert took care of the smell problem.
customer_reviews.author: Kevster5

customer_reviews.title: So I ended up with the perfect fit.

customer_reviews.title: The return of the posh running shoes
customer_reviews.text: I love to treat my feet while running by surrounding them with premium materials and premium finish, when i started running a few years ago, the Asics Gel Kayano 21 was it, a luxury running shoes, then the Gel Kayano was not the same anymore. I moved to the Brooks Transcend 3, which was great but not as posh. I've been using this for 4 month now and its amazing, I still didn't do more than half a Marathon in it, but so far it passed every test.
customer_reviews.author: Paketa

customer_reviews.title: Only athletic shoe my family will buy
customer_reviews.text: Running was killing my knees, ankles, and back. I played volleyball in High School and loved my Mizuno volleyball shoes. So I decided to try out their running shoes, since I had tried Nike, Sketchers, new balance, Reebok, Under Armor, nothing felt good on my feet. I bought the silver and red pair and FELL IN LOVE!!!! So much so I also bought the Blue and Lime pair. Also bought a pair for my dad who is a chronic back patient, he walked around Disney world for two days and said his pain was basically non existent, when in other shoes it usually would be at least an 8. This brand is amazing. I will repurchase 100000 times over.
customer_reviews.author: Kari Robbins

product_meta.title: Mizuno Men's Wave Horizon 2 Running Shoes
product_meta.description: Introducing the softest, most stable ride ever to come out of Mizuno running. Our new stability technology called smooth ride support is combined with cloud Wave to create a soft, lively and cushioned feel with adequate support and smooth guidance.
feature_bullets: Cloudwave offers a plush stable and lively feel
Fit in motion upper for flexible support
Soft anatomical sockliner for extra arch support and cushioning
